headline: Video of Ethiopia massacre shows soldiers documenting executions
author: CNN's Nima Elbagir
intro: A CNN investigation in April 2021, in collaboration with Amnesty International, exposed the horror of a massacre perpetrated by Ethiopian soldiers in Mahibere Dego in the mountains of Ethiopia's Tigray region, where government troops are battling regional forces. CNN has obtained and verified new images, confirming not only the identity of the victims but the army unit of the perpetrators. CNN's Nima Elbagir reports.

headline: UN report: 350K facing starvation in conflict-hit Ethiopia
author: CNN's Stephanie Busari
intro: Over 350,000 people in Ethiopia's conflict-ravaged Tigray region are experiencing dire hunger, finds a new report by the United Nations and other aid groups. CNN's Stephanie Busari reports.

headline: Women reveal rape being used as weapon of war in Ethiopia
author: CNN's Nima Elbgir
intro: CNN's Nima Elbgir reports on the disturbing reality for women in Ethiopia where an escalating conflict in the Tigray region has caused thousands of deaths and others to flee their homes.

headline: ICRC: We can't wait for the guns to fall silent in Ethiopia to start acting
intro: The ICRC was the first international humanitarian agency to gain access to Ethiopia's Tigray region since fighting began. The Director of the ICRC in Africa, Patrick Youssef, tells Becky Anderson that the situation is fluid and very concerning.
